bibl.title: On the Design of Two Callimachean Priamels. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: In the Hymn to Zeus, 70-90, and in the Hymn to Delos, 1-27, there is a parallelism, in a ring composition, between the gods evoked (Zeus, Apollo) and Ptolemy Philadelphus.
bibl.seg: YPSILANTI Maria, On the Design of Two Callimachean Priamels. Avec résumé en anglais.
In the Hymn to Zeus, 70-90, and in the Hymn to Delos, 1-27, there is a parallelism, in a ring composition, between the gods evoked (Zeus, Apollo) and Ptolemy Philadelphus.
